description.raw:
* Add icons and tooltips to queue buttons.
* Add icons to analysis submission
* Add icons to tab errors, restart tab.

* Set prettier default stylesheet for BLACS (essentially flat-buttons the same as in runmanager/lyse).
* Modified styling plugin to work with this sensibly

* Save some vertical UI space in tab frame - move device name into same layout as restart and refresh-smart-programming controls.

* Queue now elides the start of the filepath so that you can see the shot filename when the queue pane is small. Full path visible on tooltip.

* Save some pixels by making the minimum size of the notification area 0 and the margins on the main widget 0

* Add icons to notifications, replacing text on buttons where appropriate

* Add icons to tabs, replacing the use of red text.

![Screenshot from 2017-06-13 02-03-45.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/9pKE7ad/images/302164016-Screenshot_from_2017-06-13_02-03-45.png)
description.html:
• Add icons and tooltips to queue buttons.
  • Add icons to analysis submission

  • Add icons to tab errors, restart tab.

  • Set prettier default stylesheet for BLACS (essentially flat-buttons the same as in runmanager/lyse).

  • Modified styling plugin to work with this sensibly

  • Save some vertical UI space in tab frame - move device name into same layout as restart and refresh-smart-programming controls.

  • Queue now elides the start of the filepath so that you can see the shot filename when the queue pane is small. Full path visible on tooltip.

  • Save some pixels by making the minimum size of the notification area 0 and the margins on the main widget 0

  • Add icons to notifications, replacing text on buttons where appropriate

  • Add icons to tabs, replacing the use of red text.

title: Icons and some pixel-saving
